title: Why you should buy this Mrs Hinch recommended Shark vacuum
text:
Cleaning guru Mrs Hinch has raved about it and it's said to be better than a Dyson. So if you're after a new vacuum cleaner, a Shark is the way to go.

Usually priced at £249, the Shark NV601UK Lift-Away Upright Vacuum Cleaner is available for just £169 on Amazon right now.

And you get two for the price of one, as it converts into a handheld vacuum for cleaning tricky areas like stairs and ceilings.

The Shark Lift-Away Upright Vacuum Cleaner is currently over 30 per cent off on Amazon

Scoring an impressive 4.7 out of five stars on Amazon, the vacuum - which is the same model that Mrs Hinch uses - has notched up rave reviews.

One reviewer wrote: 'I've gone through my fair share of Dysons and other brands, and I can safely say I'll never look back. This machine is 10/10 across the board.'

Another said the first thing she noticed when using a shark was how quiet it was. 'Like some other buyers, we came to believe through using Dysons for many years that good must mean enduring a deafeningly loud performance.

'What a revelation when we used the Shark for the first time - silence. There is no comparison in their cleaning performance.'

The 2-in-1 Shark Lift Away Upright Vacuum can clean hard to reach areas like stairs and ceilings, and the handheld attachment is great for sofas

Shark vacuums use 'Lift-Away Technology', which enables them to convert from a traditional upright into a portable vacuum in an instant, for a deep clean with no loss of suction.

Lightweight and easy to use, the vacuum comes with multiple attachments carefully designed to help you get a better clean.

The bugless vacuum is also great for allergy sufferers as it captures and holds 99.9 per cent of dust and allergens inside the vacuum.

Enhanced swivel steering makes the vacuum even more flexible in tight areas
